name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior DFM Engineer with 13+ years of experience in CNC, 3D Printing, and SolidWorks, specializing in Design for Manufacturing (DFM) and product development processes. Adept at applying GD&T principles to optimize mechanical designs for manufacturability and efficiency, with a strong focus on material selection and sheet metal fabrication.
Skilled in troubleshooting and problem-solving, effectively collaborating with cross-functional teams to enhance production processes and ensure customer satisfaction. Experienced in advanced manufacturing techniques including EDM, grinding, honing, lapping, welding, press brake, laser cutting, waterjet cutting, and stamping. 
Proven track record in managing design projects and implementing best practices in manufacturing, demonstrating strong communication skills, adaptability, and a customer-focused approach.

Utilized CNC machinery for producing high-fidelity parts, implementing best practices in **sheet metal** fabrication and **laser cutting** techniques to enhance production efficiency by **30%**.

Collaborated closely with multidisciplinary teams to communicate project specifications and provide technical support, fostering a **customer-focused** approach and ensuring successful project delivery within budget and time constraints.
Developed and maintained process documentation for various manufacturing stages, enabling adaptability and quick onboarding of new team members with a clear focus on quality and compliance.
Led workshops on best practices for manufacturing techniques, enhancing team skills in **stamping** and effective **press brake** operations, contributing to overall team performance and morale.
Implemented feedback mechanisms to continuously gather insights from production teams, promoting a culture of **collaboration** and driving innovation in manufacturing techniques.

Ensured effective collaboration and communication among cross-functional teams to drive design for manufacturability (DFM) initiatives, enhancing overall product quality by **25%**.
Utilized **SolidWorks** for 3D modeling and simulation, resulting in a **15%** reduction in design iteration time and improving project turnaround.
Applied **GD&T** principles to enhance manufacturing accuracy and compliance, leading to a **20%** decrease in production errors.
Conducted thorough material selection and evaluation, leveraging knowledge in sheet metal processes and techniques to optimize cost and performance.
Led troubleshooting sessions to address manufacturing challenges, employing problem-solving strategies to reduce downtime by **30%**.
Implemented advanced fabrication techniques, including **laser cutting**, **waterjet cutting**, and **EDM**, which enhanced production efficiency by **40%**.
Pioneered welding and stamping processes to improve product durability, resulting in an increase in customer satisfaction metrics by **35%**.
Fostered a customer-focused approach in product development, ensuring alignment with client specifications and expectations through effective adaptability and collaboration.

Utilized **SolidWorks** for 3D modeling and design validation, ensuring optimal design for manufacturability (DFM) across **9** product lines.
